    T

    teardown() - Method in class com.tom.jpedit.ApplicationContext
    Called by the program once all windows have closed to finalize shutdown This method should NOT be called by plugins.
    terminate() - Method in class com.tom.jpedit.workers.AutoSaveWorker
     
    terminateAutoSaveWorker() - Method in class com.tom.jpedit.gui.JPEditWindow
    Sets the autoSaveEnabled to false, cancels the Future and shuts down the executor, and deletes the temporary file created by autosave worker Auto-save cannot be turned back on once this method is called.
    terminateEarly() - Static method in class com.tom.jpedit.ApplicationContext
    Terminates the application early by simulating window close events for all open windows and performing the necessary cleanup without immediately triggering system exit.
    text - Variable in enum class com.tom.jpedit.gui.i18n.Strings.Content
